question_id: Tampilkan nama aktor dan jumlah film yang mereka bintangi, urutkan dari yang terbanyak.
sql_query:
SELECT
  a.first_name AS nama_aktor,
  COUNT(f.film_id) AS jumlah_film
FROM actor AS a
JOIN film_actor AS fa
  ON a.actor_id = fa.actor_id
JOIN film AS f
  ON fa.film_id = f.film_id
GROUP BY
  a.first_name
ORDER BY
  jumlah_film DESC
raw_response:
```sql
SELECT
  a.first_name AS nama_aktor,
  COUNT(f.film_id) AS jumlah_film
FROM actor AS a
JOIN film_actor AS fa
  ON a.actor_id = fa.actor_id
JOIN film AS f
  ON fa.film_id = f.film_id
GROUP BY
  a.first_name
ORDER BY
  jumlah_film DESC;
```
